message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  It's a good deal for both of us, trust me.
Your turn, Alice. How about a more realistic split? 70/30 seems fair considering the time pressure.
Okay, Bob. Let's be reasonable. I'll take 40%, you take 60%.  We both get a decent chunk of the money, and we can avoid the risk of getting nothing at all.
